resources.string: Cup-A-Coffee Shop and Gallery offers a unique coffee house environment unlike any other in macon.We are not only a place to drop in and get your morning cup of coffee (although you are more than welcome to do that) ,We are a place where you can sit down and enjoy that tailor-made cup of coffee.If you need to work ,We have a seating area created specifically for ypu . If you need to rest , we have a comfortable seating area right in front of the library. .Once again Welcome to Cup-A-Coffee, where your daily caffeine fix meets the convenience of modern technology. Our coffee shop app is your gateway to a world of rich, aromatic brews and delectable treats.
